attributes.comment:
Please don't raise the filing fees pertaining to adoption/ orphan petitions,
citizenship certificates, etc. Financially, I scraped everything up that I could to
afford the adoption of my two wonderful children. It is so very hard for most
families adopting to raise all of the needed money without going into debt. There
is such a great need for adoption in this world. Please don't make it MORE
difficult for those of us who WANT these orphans, but financially can't put together
the gigantic sums of money needed to bring them home. Thank you. Sincerely,
Lisa Reidenbach

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Lisa Reidenbach
